definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to hand over/to pass on sth/to gradually increase or decrease/progressively

sentences.english: Christ's righteousness has been imputed to us.
sentences.chinese: 基督的正直轉遞給了我們。

sentences.english: Please forward our post to our new home when we move.
sentences.chinese: 我們搬家後，請將郵件轉遞到我們的新住處。

sentences.english: An operator can now limit transmitting outside the programmed frequency band.
sentences.chinese: 運營商現在可以限制轉遞程序以外的頻帶。
他們不會留下轉遞地址。
